policies.involuntary_refund:
Involuntary Refund:
- If the originally booked flight was cancelled (UN in PNR), agent may proceed with full refund.
- If alternate flight was cancelled prior to departure, full refund is allowed without waiver.
- Agent must provide PNR history showing cancellation (XS segment).

24-Hour Risk-Free:
- Luxair offers a 24-hour risk-free refund for tickets purchased at least one week before departure through official channels (website or app).
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Involuntary Exchange:
- Free exchange allowed within 3 days of original flight.
- If rebooking outside that window or same class unavailable â†’ fare difference applies.
- No waiver code required.

Voluntary Changes:
- Must follow fare rules displayed in GDS.
- Change fees and fare differences may apply depending on fare category.
- If change results in lower fare, no residual refund unless permitted by fare rules.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Voluntary Refunds:
- Agents must check fare conditions via FQN in GDS.
policies.medical_refund:
- No formal waiver code system is published.
- Involuntary cases do not require waiver for refund or exchange (e.g., UN segment).
- Escalation for exceptional refund or tax correction must be sent to Claude at Luxair HQ.
policies.name_change:
- One-letter correction allowed in first or last name.
- No reissue required.
- OSI must be added to the PNR for audit trail.
- Complete name changes or corrections beyond one letter are not permitted; reissue may be required as per fare rules.
policies.group_booking:
- Groups of 10 or more must be requested via Luxair Groups team.
- Deposit and payment timelines apply based on departure date.
- Group fare includes checked baggage; seat selection and other ancillaries must be confirmed separately.
- Group contract may allow limited free name changes prior to ticketing.
- Infants within group: 90% discount when traveling on lap.
policies.infant_policy:
- Infants (under 2 years old) may travel on adult's lap with 90% fare discount.
- For additional comfort, adult may purchase an extra seat at child fare and use an approved car seat.
- Infant must be at least 7 days old to travel.
- Child fare (25% discount) applies to passengers age 2 to under 12.
- If child turns 2 during the trip, full child fare applies throughout; contact Luxair to book appropriately.
policies.baggage_policy:
- Carry-on: 1 cabin bag (max 8kg) + 1 personal item allowed.
- Checked baggage: Allowance depends on fare type and route (reflected on ticket).
- Excess baggage fees apply; over 32kg not accepted.
- Musical instruments and sports equipment accepted per size and liability waiver.
- Pets must be in approved carriers; total weight limit applies.
- Compensation capped at 1,519 SDR for lost or damaged baggage.
- Passengers advised not to place valuables in checked luggage.
policies.seat_request_policy:
- Advance seat selection available for a fee or included depending on fare/flex bundle.
- Emergency exit row seats restricted to passengers 16+, non-disabled, not pregnant, and not traveling with pets or infants.
- If Luxair must move a passenger for safety or operational reasons, seat fee may be refunded.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
- Tickets may be voided same-day within BSPLink standard window.
- After that window, refund rules apply per fare category.
- No post-midnight voiding unless authorized by Luxair ARC contact.
- No penalty-free void outside same-day issuance window.
